trans-unit.source: Represents the types of handles the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle" /> class can allocate.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle" /> 类可以分配的句柄的类型。

trans-unit.source: This handle type represents an opaque handle, meaning you cannot resolve the address of the pinned object through the handle.
trans-unit.target: 此句柄类型表示不透明句柄，这意味着无法通过此句柄解析固定对象的地址。

trans-unit.source: You can use this type to track an object and prevent its collection by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此类型跟踪对象，并防止它被垃圾回收器回收。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration member is useful when an unmanaged client holds the only reference, which is undetectable from the garbage collector, to a managed object.
trans-unit.target: 当非托管客户端持有对托管对象的唯一引用（从垃圾回收器检测不到该引用）时，此枚举成员很有用。

trans-unit.source: This handle type is similar to <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandleType.Normal" />, but allows the address of the pinned object to be taken.
trans-unit.target: 此句柄类型类似于 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandleType.Normal" />，但允许使用固定对象的地址。

trans-unit.source: This prevents the garbage collector from moving the object and hence undermines the efficiency of the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 这将防止垃圾回收器移动对象，因此将降低垃圾回收器的效率。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle.Free" /> method to free the allocated handle as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle.Free" /> 方法可尽快释放已分配的句柄。

trans-unit.source: This handle type is used to track an object, but allow it to be collected.
trans-unit.target: 此句柄类型用于跟踪对象，但允许回收该对象。

trans-unit.source: When an object is collected, the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle" /> are zeroed.
trans-unit.target: 当回收某个对象时，<see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle" /> 的内容归零。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Weak" /> references are zeroed before the finalizer runs, so even if the finalizer resurrects the object, the <see langword="Weak" /> reference is still zeroed.
trans-unit.target: 在终结器运行之前，<see langword="Weak" /> 引用归零，因此即使终结器使该对象复活，<see langword="Weak" /> 引用仍然是归零的。

trans-unit.source: This handle type is similar to <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandleType.Weak" />, but the handle is not zeroed if the object is resurrected during finalization.
trans-unit.target: 该句柄类型类似于 <see cref="F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandleType.Weak" />，但如果对象在终结过程中复活，此句柄不归零。
